mapper.select: SELECT pro.product_key, bom.material_key AS productCode, pro.product_name, pro.company_key, com.company_name, (cmat.quantity * bom.quantity) AS quantity, orout.outsource_key, orout.outsource_state, pro.standard_price, (pro.standard_price * cmat.quantity) AS totalPrice FROM tbl_order_contract con LEFT JOIN tbl_order_contract_materials cmat ON cmat.contract_code = con.contract_code LEFT JOIN tbl_product_bom bom ON cmat.product_key = bom.root_key LEFT JOIN tbl_product pro ON pro.product_key = bom.material_key LEFT JOIN tbl_company com ON com.company_key = pro.company_key LEFT JOIN tbl_common_code_sub sub ON pro.process_type_key = sub.sub_common_key LEFT JOIN tbl_order_outsource orout ON cmat.contract_code = orout.contract_code AND orout.product_key = bom.material_key WHERE cmat.contract_code = #{contractCode} AND sub.sub_common_key = #{processOutsourcedKey} AND cmat.is_deleted = 0 AND orout.contract_code IS NULL AND bom.is_deleted = 0 AND con.is_deleted = 0 AND con.is_completed = 2

SELECT result.contract_code, result.quantity, result.is_completed, result.outsource_state, result.outsourceStatusResult, result.contract_name, result.contract_date, result.delivery_date, result.company_name, result.company_key, result.product_code, result.product_name, result.product_key, result.asset_type_flag, result.safety_quantity, result.sub_common_name AS unit_name, result.reg_date_time FROM ( SELECT orout.contract_code, orout.quantity, con.is_completed, con.contract_name, con.contract_date, con.delivery_date, com.company_name, com.company_key, pro.product_code, pro.product_name, pro.product_key, pro.asset_type_flag, pro.safety_quantity, sub.sub_common_name, orout.reg_date_time, MAX(orout.outsource_state) AS outsource_state, CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN orout.outsource_state = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = COUNT(*) THEN 'C' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN orout.outsource_state = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN orout.outsource_state = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'O' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN orout.outsource_state = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = COUNT(*) THEN 'O' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN orout.outsource_state IN ('O', 'P') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'X' ELSE 'O' END AS outsourceStatusResult FROM tbl_order_outsource orout LEFT JOIN tbl_order_contract con ON con.contract_code = orout.contract_code LEFT JOIN tbl_order_contract_materials conm ON con.contract_code = conm.contract_code LEFT JOIN tbl_company com ON com.company_key = orout.company_key LEFT JOIN tbl_product pro ON pro.product_key = conm.product_key LEFT JOIN tbl_common_code_sub sub ON sub.sub_common_key = pro.unit_key WHERE orout.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY orout.contract_code ) AS result WHERE result.outsourceStatusResult IN ('C', 'O', 'X')

SELECT orout.contract_code, orout.outsource_key, orout.company_key, com.company_name, orout.quantity, orout.outgoing_complete_date, orout.inbound_date_time, orout.incoming_est_date, orout.incoming_date_time, orout.outgoing_user_key, orout.incoming_user_key, orout.outsource_state, orout.product_key, pro.product_name, pro.product_code, pro.standard_price, (pro.standard_price * orout.quantity) AS totalPrice FROM tbl_order_outsource orout LEFT JOIN tbl_order_contract con ON con.contract_code = orout.contract_code LEFT JOIN tbl_company com ON com.company_key = orout.company_key LEFT JOIN tbl_product pro ON pro.product_key = orout.product_key WHERE orout.is_deleted = 0 AND pro.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY orout.reg_date_time DESC
